OLX Group | Lisbon, Portugal | Full-time

http://www.joinolx.com/

The OLX Group is a network of leading classifieds platforms in 40 markets, including brands like OLX, Avito, Letgo, Dubizzle, Standvirtual among others.

Hundreds of millions of people in local markets around the world generate more than 1.7 billion monthly visits, 35 billion monthly page views and 54 million listings every month on the OLX Group's online marketplaces.

Positions:

- Backend Developer (PHP, Laravel, MySQL, Redis)

- Frontend Developer (React, pure Javascript)

- Architect

- Test Engineer

Please send e-mail to miguel.alpendre@olx.com to apply.
